```{r, load packages}

library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

```

```{r, read in data}

showshoe_hares <- read_csv("showshoe_lter.csv")

```

```{r, wrangle data}

hares_wrangle <- showshoe_hares %>% 
  filter(sex %in% c("M", "F"))  %>% # look for anything in sex column that matching anything in this string, a way to get rid of NAs
  drop_na("weight")
  
```

```{r, plot data}

hare_boxplot <- ggplot(hares_wrangle, aes(x = sex, y = weight)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.3, aes(color = sex)) + # Width of jitter, opacity(alpha) of dots, color coding by sex
  theme_classic() +
  labs (x = "Sex", y = "Body weight (g)", color = "Sex", title = "Box-and-Whisker Plot with Overlying Jitter of Showshoe Hares Body Mass", subtitle = "Corinna Hong") # Add axis labels, change legend title, add a plot title

hare_boxplot

```
